HH.CO.summary: H+H International A/S produces and sells autoclaved aerated concrete and calcium silicate building blocks used for wall-building in the United Kingdom, Central Western Europe, and Poland. It offers thin-joint blocks and panels for interior and exterior walls, as well as foundation blocks; reinforced elements for floors, walls, and roofs; reinforced beams and lintels; and high-insulating blocks. The company's products are used primarily in the residential new building segment. It serves housebuilders, developers, and builders' merchants. The company was founded in 1909 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

RIAS-B.CO.summary: RIAS A/S supplies plastic products in Scandinavia. It offers semi-finished plastic products for industries, such as building, construction, chemical, mechanical, offshore, food, furniture and packaging, and visual communication industries. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Roskilde, Denmark. RIAS A/S is a subsidiary of thyssenkrupp Facilities Services GmbH.
